entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
